root.name: NBA Live 10
root.description: NBA Live 10 Information Dwight Howard is on the cover this year. NBA Live 10 will be available for iPhone, Playstation 3, PSP, and Xbox 360 platforms. The game was released on October 6th 2009. A game demo for NBA Live 10 was released on the Xbox Live Marketplace on September 11th, 2009. Soundtrack 88-Keys feat. Colin Munroe - Wake Up CallsAfrika Bambaataa feat. Why G, Mickey Factz Fort Knox Five - We Don't Stop YawlB.o.B. - ChampionBeastie Boys - Pop Your BalloonDavid Banner GQ - S.P.I.T.De La Soul - La La LaDead Prez - Still Bigga ThanEmbassy Music Board - OvertimeGrand Puba - Get ItLaza - Crank It UpMatt and Kim feat.
